title: Harbor Mole
credit_line: Gift of Frances L. Drew, M.D.
provenance_text:
Lyonel Feininger [1871-1956], Germany. F. R. Schon, Switzerland and Toronto, Canada, by 1936-40; Dominion Gallery, Montreal, Canada, 1943 or 1944; Mr. and Mrs. John Drew, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1946 [1]; fractional gifts of  Frances L. Drew, M.D. (Mrs. John Drew), 1984 to 1992; Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1992.

Notes:
[1]. See American paintings and Sculpture, pages 186-188.

Under review by CGK
